subprocess_flow.description: The Purchasing Department receives the replenishment order from the Inventory Management Team.
success_criteria: Replenishment order is received by the Purchasing Department.

subprocess_flow.description: The Purchasing Department verifies the order details, including product ID, quantity, and delivery instructions, against the pre-approved order templates (if used) and current supplier agreements.
success_criteria: Order details are verified for accuracy and compliance.

subprocess_flow.description: The Purchasing Department sends the verified replenishment order to the warehouse for fulfillment.
success_criteria: Replenishment order is sent to the warehouse.

subprocess_flow.description: Warehouse staff receives the replenishment order from the Purchasing Department.
success_criteria: Replenishment order is received by the warehouse staff.

subprocess_flow.description: The dedicated picking and packing team picks the inventory from the warehouse shelves, packs it securely, and prepares it for shipment to the store.
success_criteria: Inventory is accurately picked and securely packed for shipment.

subprocess_flow.description: Warehouse staff updates the inventory management system to account for the reduced stock amounts in the warehouse.
success_criteria: Inventory management system is updated with accurate stock levels.

subprocess_flow.description: The warehouse ships the packed inventory to the store using expedited shipping options.
success_criteria: Inventory is shipped to the store within the agreed lead time.

subprocess_flow.description: The Purchasing Department tracks the order and communicates any delays or issues to the Inventory Management Team.
success_criteria: Order is tracked and any issues are communicated promptly.
